Proposal for Tennis Court Resurfacing Project

Dear Patrick Franco,

Thank you for contacting Play Hardscapes about resurfacing your tennis court in Roanoke. Based on the details you provided, I'm excited to present this proposal for your project. As the owner, I will be your main point of contact and will personally ensure your court is resurfaced to the highest standards.

Project Scope

The project will involve resurfacing your existing 120' x 78' asphalt tennis court, totaling approximately 7,200 square feet. The scope of work includes:

  • Pressure washing the existing surface to remove dirt and debris
  • Acid washing the court to etch the surface and promote adhesion of the new coatings
  • Filling any cracks and leveling low spots in the asphalt to create an even surface
  • Applying an acrylic resurfacer to the court
  • Painting the playing lines for one regulation tennis court
  • Applying one color of textured acrylic top coat to provide a durable, long-lasting playing surface with excellent traction

Timeline and Logistics

We estimate the project will take 4 days to complete, not including travel time. Our experienced 3-person crew will make the 53 mile trip to your location in Roanoke, which will add 2 travel days. We will bring all the necessary equipment and materials to complete the job efficiently and to the highest quality standards.

Pricing

To proceed with scheduling the work, we require a 50% deposit of [insert amount], with the balance due upon satisfactory completion of the project. We accept payments by check, credit card, or bank transfer.

Next Steps

If this proposal meets your expectations, please reply to this email or call me directly at 540-556-0413 to discuss next steps. I'd be happy to answer any additional questions you may have and discuss scheduling options. Upon accepting the proposal, I will prepare a contract for your review and signature.

Thank you again for considering Play Hardscapes for your tennis court resurfacing project. I look forward to the opportunity to work with you and deliver a top-quality playing surface that you can enjoy for years to come.
